page.title: 20OUR SURVEY OF BROADWAY AREA.
page.content: We have enjoyed doing this survey of {Broadway, Willersey and Saintbury, parts of which are in{Worcestershire and parts in{Gloucestershire.}We spent many pleasant summer evenings walking through the area and exploring places we had not seen before.We are members of{Wickhamford Women's Institute. {Wickhamford}is a small village three and a half miles from{Broadway}along the A44 road in the{Vale of Evesham. The following members took part in the survey and wrote the entries:- Sue Bearcroft,Pat Bell,Betty Bowles,Pat Clinton,Hazel Cole,Denny King,Alison Rapley,Thelma Shannon-Garvey,Jenny Tweney,Jane Vacalopoulos.These members also helped with the survey:- Pam Corbett,Hilda Evans,Diane Maden,Jill Roberts,Rosemary Hendricks,Norah Roberts,Connie Whiting. Pat Bell and Denny King edited the information.
